text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*Additional registration information for the Patient resource
extension 0..*ExtensionSlice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:registrationPeriod 0..1ExtensionThe period of time during which the Patient registration applies
url 1..1uri"registrationPeriod"
valuePeriod:valuePeriod 1..1PeriodThe period of time during which the Patient registration applies.
extension:registrationType 0..1ExtensionThe type of patient registration at the healthcare organisation
url 1..1uri"registrationType"
valueCodeableConcept:valueCodeableConcept 1..1CodeableConceptThe type of registration for a patient at a healthcare organisation.
Binding: Care Connect Registration Type (required)
extension:preferredBranchSurgery 0..1Extension
url 1..1uri"preferredBranchSurgery"
valueReference:valueReference 0..1Reference(CareConnect-Location-1)Location of usual branch surgery
url 1..1uri"https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/Extension-CareConnect-RegistrationDetails-1"
value[x] 0..0

Documentation for this format

name: Extension-CareConnect-RegistrationDetails-1
description: This extension is constrained to represent the additional registration information for a patient.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
